title: [PATCH] Fixed the contact email for a mentor
author: Circuit-Overtime

gist.headline: Reconnecting the lines
gist.blurb: Updated the contact channels for our GSoC mentors. No more messages lost in the digital void!
gist.summary: Corrected the contact email address for a mentor in the Google Summer of Code documentation.
gist.impact: Contributors can now successfully reach the correct mentor without communication errors.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee acting as a mail carrier. Since this is about fixing an email address, a scene of the bee delivering a letter or fixing a mailbox fits perfectly. The setting should be a sunny, nature-filled garden representing the GSoC community.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit bee mascot putting a letter into a cute rustic mailbox in a sunny garden. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel blue gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Like Stardew Valley mail delivery. Emotionally warm, nostalgic.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee mail-carrier delivering a letter to a mentor character in a library. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel envelope icon. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
